def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_same_size = same_size([x,y], ctx)
        check_xy_different_color = different_color([x,y], ctx)
        check_x_dark_grey = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_lighter_x = are_lighter([y], [x], ctx)
        check_y_above_right_x = are_above_right([y], [x], ctx, diagonal=True)
        if (
            check_xy_same_size
            and check_xy_different_color
            and check_x_dark_grey
            and check_y_lighter_x
            and check_y_above_right_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
